org.atmosphere.tests.guice
Class PubSubTest

java.lang.Object
  org.atmosphere.tests.guice.PubSubTest

public class PubSubTest
extends Object

Simple PubSubTest resource that demonstrate many functionality supported by Atmosphere.

Author:
Jeanfrancois Arcand
